fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.source

Class POMManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.source.POMManager

  • public class POMManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles POM file manipulation using the Maven API.
